name: It Came From The Closet (Jam Version)
name_original: It Came From The Closet (Jam Version)
description:
In this top down, stealth, horror game you play as a monster from Monstertown who was caught loitering and must sneak into children's rooms and scare them for your court-ordered community service.

Made for the STLScatterJam2017

Diversifiers:

  • Limited Color Pallatte
  • Pacifist
